headline: Kimberly-Clark’s (KMB) at a “Generational Low,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed.
